body.name: Mini Dash Cam - Front and Rear 2K Surfola Dual Car Camera 2560x1440P, 3" inch IPS Screen, 170° Wide Angle, Parking Mode, WDR, Accident Record
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🎅🎁2K&720P Dash Cam Front and Rear - SD310 dual dash cam equipped with 1440P resolution front camera and waterproof rear camera. Advanced sensor allowed this dash camera to record during day and night time, captures the whole driving in crystal-clear definition. The video quality is definitely better than the 1080P dash cam at the same price on the market.

🎅🎁Superior Night Vision Dual Dash Cam - SD310 car dash cam front and rear equipped with high performance chip, F1.8 aperture and WDR technology, which makes night shots brighter and prevents overexposure. Thus enhances the clarity of images.The dashboard camera eliminates the need for an auxiliary light source even in low-light environments.

🎅🎁24 Hours Parking Monitor Car Camera - SD310 car recorder will automatically turn on and lock the current video to save evidence when the car takes collision even without charging. The internal battery will monitor your car 24/7, even when the engine is off. Better security functions help users restore evidence needed.

🎅🎁Car Cam with Loop Recording&Emergency Lock - When the built-in G-sensor detects a sudden shake/collision, the current video will be automatically locked to prevent it from being overwritten. Accident scene can be truly restored. Loop recording overwrites the oldest footage with the newest upon filling a card to capacity, but will skip the emergency locked video (locked files will not be overwritten).

🎅🎁Easy to Install Dash Camera - Easily mount to your car's windshield with the included suction cup and holder. Inserting 32GB/128GB TF Card to card slot(Card is not included), connecting the dash camera with the power cable, inserting the power cable to sockets, the driving camera will automatically turn on and record when you start the engine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Surfola Dash Cam is today's most advanced and powerful Video Car Dash Camera featuring : Very important: 1. If you do not want the mirror rear cam, please let us know to get the new firmware. The new firmware will help the dash cam add a new choice on settings named “Mirror image”, you can choose to turn it on or off by yourself. 2. Micro SD Card NOT included in package. This cam can support a class 10 micro SD card, 32GB/128GB(You are not suggested to use 64GB TF card). A TF card should be formatted on computer as FAT32 64KB and formatted on this unit itself again. As there are so many fake cards in the markets, you can choose Toshiba, Samsung, Panasonic these brands from official channel. 3. If you need dash cam record 24 hours after parked, you will need install car dash cam with a hard wire kit. 4. To ensure seamless recording, we suggest: 1) Turn off motion detection and parking mode while driving and turn the G-sensor sensitivity to low, 2). Turn on loop recording, 3). Format card monthly.

Front 1440P & Rear 720P Recording SD310 dash cam captures video in 2560*1440P QHD resolution (front) and 720P (rear). With an outstanding resolution, it captures your driving moment vividly. Showing strong evidence by crisp and smooth videos when the incident happens. Excellent Night Vision The combination of F1.8 aperture and WDR technology provide adaptive sensitivity of lights to enhances the clarity both day and night. It makes the night shoot brighter and prevents overexposure, suitable for most light conditions. 24H Parking Monitor With the G-sensor Parking mode, SD310 dash camera for cars will automatically record a short video and lock it when it detects a sudden bump or impact. The parking Monitor mode provides your car with 24-hour protection.

170° Wide-Angle Lens With 170° front and 140° rear ultra-wide dual lens, the SD310 dash cam can provide you a full view of 5 lanes of the road, which eliminates the blind spots of your vision and provides greater security. Wide Dynamic Range Wide dynamic range technology compensates for light/dark spots and balances exposure, this ensures no overexposure during the day and brings greater clarity at night. Enable the dash cam to capture good detail and compensating for lack of headlights or other lighting politely when required at night. Easy Installation & Use SD310 dash cam is very easy to install and operate with reference pictures in our user manual.Just insert SD card (not included) and connect to the power supply. The car dash camera will start recording immediately after igniting, shut down and save the video when you shut off the engine.

SD310 SD810 SD510 SD710 Camera Type Front and Rear Front and Rear Front and Rear Front and Rear Video Resolution 2K Front + 720P Rear 4K Front + 1080P Rear 1080P Front + 720P Rear 2.5K Front + 1080P Rear Image Sensor Starvis Sensor Sony Starvis Sensor Starvis Sensor Sony IMX335 Sensor Display Type 3‘‘ IPS 3’‘ Touch Screen 3‘‘ IPS 3‘‘ IPS GPS Tracker N/A ✓ N/A Optional GPS Built-in Wi-Fi N/A ✓ ✓ N/A Connector Type Mini USB Type-C Type-C Type-C Wide Angle 170° Front + 140° Rear Dual 170° 170° Front + 140° Rear Dual 170° Recommended SD Card 32/128GB, Class 10 32/128/256GB, U3 32/128GB, Class 10 32/128GB, Class 10 Mounting Type Suction Cup Suction Cup Suction Cup Unique 3M Magnetic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SELLER DID NOT TELL PROBLEM WITH CAM UNTIL AFTER I RECEIVED DASHCAM
reviews.reviewText: 2nd Dashcam Ive had to return due to lying in ad or omitting important functions. Got this message after I received it. Why wasnt this sent when I purchased it right away????????Hi friend,This is Surfola Direct.Thank you for your support on Surfola.Have you received our product - SD310?For your better using experience, here we provide you with some warm tips:①You are suggested to use a class 10, SDHC 128GB max supported TF card (We do not suggest you use the 64GB TF card). A TF card should be formatted on the computer as FAT32 64KB and formatted on this unit again at first use.②With the loop recording on, the newest video will automatically overwrite the oldest one when the TF card meets its maximum capacity. However, there is also a function named G sensor in this cam, so the cam will lock the current video when there is a sudden collision/shake and the locked videos won't be overwritten even in loop recording. Also, the videos under parking mode would also be saved from being overwritten. So I do suggest you format the TF card regularly and set the sensibility of the G sensor to a lower value to prevent there is too much locked video taking up the storage space.③After a while the screen shuts off during recording, which is a normal phenomenon named screensaver mode and you needn’t to worry about it. It's just for energy saving while the cam is still recording. If you want to keep the screen stay on when recording, please enter the setting mode and turn off the “screen saver”.No matter what questions or problems bother you, please contact our professional after-sales team:support.dc@surfola.co(put 5 lines in 1 line)Thank you for your purchase. Have a nice day and take care.Kind regards,Surfola Direct

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works, I think.
reviews.reviewText: Video quality appears nice. Back camera keeps falling down, but the front camera works well, just picture doesnt stay on so i assume it is recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Connections are retired USB b type
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find outdated cables. I wanted to replace the one in the cig lighter but this is old USB B type, hard to keep up when your technology is behind. If I use this then my cig lighter is useless for other items. If you update your connections I'd keep, but not outdated retired USB type cable. At least A types are easier to find without having to plug into cig lighter directly. You can have this back. I'll pay more for current connections

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Advertises with motion sensing auto turn on but doesn't work, tried multiple times while in park mode

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: After using it for half a year, it will not automatically record from now on, and now I have to reinstall the memory card every time I start it. The feeling of use is very bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok dash cam for price.
reviews.reviewText: Same like others in this price range, not 2k front and 1080p rear, more like 1080p front and between 480-720p rear. Only records front facing camera, does not record rear facing camera. Not true 2-channel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ordered in late January, has already quit working
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Seems the internal battery has quit working, there was a flawless installation and has worked fine in my new car. There is nothing wrong with my card electrical system or the wiring. Even the car battery has been tested.
